title: Storage Locations
form_base_path_tip: Local mount point or root path where harvested files will be written
s3_endpoint_url_tip: Override for S3-compatible services (e.g. MinIO, Wasabi). Leave blank for standard AWS S3.
s3_region_tip: AWS region where the bucket lives (e.g. us-east-1)
cifs_domain_tip: Active Directory domain for SMB authentication. Leave blank for local or workgroup accounts.
nfs_mount_options_tip: Comma-separated NFS mount flags (e.g. rw,hard,intr). Leave blank for system defaults.
